T02D1721:89a-0: @89a # // rje btsun sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1721:89a-2: ltos pa thams cad rab spangs te //
T02D1721:89a-3: ci 'byor mchod pa sngon du bya //
T02D1721:89a-4: byang chub sems ni brtan par bsgom //
T02D1721:89a-5: 'byung bzhi thim pa lha bzhir bsgom //
T02D1721:89a-6: rnam shes thim pa yid kyi lha //
T02D1721:89a-8: bskyed rim thim pa rdzogs rim bsgom //
T02D1721:89a-9: lus kyi shed nyams smig rgyu snang //
T02D1721:89a-10: snying gar bla ma bsgom par bya //
T02D1721:89a-11: sgo dgu skam sa na du ba 'byung //
T02D1721:89b-0: lte bar rdo rje sems dpa' @89b bsgom ;
T02D1721:89b-1: / drod brtul srin bu me khyer 'dra //
T02D1721:89b-2: gsang bar don yod grub pa bsgom //
T02D1721:89b-3: dbugs chad mar me 'bar ba mthong //
T02D1721:89b-4: smin mtshams rta mgrin bsgom par bya //
T02D1721:89b-5: srog bral nam mkha' 'dra ba la //
T02D1721:89b-6: thams cad 'dus pa lhag pa'i lha //
T02D1721:89b-8: rang gis ji ltar bzod ltar bsgom //
T02D1721:89b-9: mthar ni pha ma'i sa bon gnyis //
T02D1721:89b-10: dkar dmar thig le nyi zlar gyur //
T02D1721:89b-11: kha sbyar dbus su rang gi sems //
T02D1721:89b-12: srog gi sa bon t'am yig blta //
T02D1721:89b-15: bcu gnyis mdzad pa mthar phyung ste //
T02D1721:89b-17: gson tshe srog rtsol la brten nas //
T02D1721:89b-18: thim pa bdun ni rim bzhin bsgom //
T02D1721:89b-20: ma brjed tsam gyis 'grub par bzhed //
T02D1721:89b-21: rje btsun a'arya t'a ra'i man ngag la brten nas
T02D1721:89b-22: 'chi ka ma'i nyams len dpal chos kyi rje sa'i
T02D1721:89b-23: steng na 'gran zla dang bral ba'i kha che sh'akya
T02D1721:89b-24: shr'i bha dra'i zhal snga nas lo ts'a ba byams
